col.cs.risk.model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • col.cs.risk.model.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Team GameModel class is to maintain game data such as continents, territories, players.

      • isValidMapFormat

        public boolean isValidMapFormat()
        It does 3 map validations, 1) checks whether the tags are correct 2) checks all territories are connected 3) checks whether all territories are belongs to the predefined continents.
        Returns:
        true if map file is valid else false.
